c74object.name: sp.classtrain
c74object.digest: Create classes based on input analysis
c74object.description: Finds the nearest match based on pre-trained classes/clusters.

discussion.p: The sp.classtrain object will create a classifier based on incoming class labels and descriptor analysis. The labels can be the default Sensory Percussion labels or any arbitrary input.

inlet.description: Incoming buffer~ of descriptors to attach to the current label/class. Also takes the messages for object control.

outlet.description: The nearest match in the pre-trained classifier.
Total amount of entries that have been sent to the classifier.

method.name: class
method.description: The label you want to apply to the incoming entries. The following argument will be the name of the class. e.g. 'class center'

method.name: print
method.digest: Print dataset contents to Max console
method.description: Prints a summary of the descriptors in the dataset to the Max console.

method.name: train
method.description: Enables the training mode for the internal classifier.

method.name: write
method.description: Write a .json file with all the descriptors and class labels to disk.

entry.name: list
entry.description: Incoming buffer~ of descriptors to attach to the current label/class. Also takes the messages for object control.

entry.name: list
entry.description: The nearest match in the pre-trained classifier.

entry.name: int
entry.description: Total amount of entries that have been sent to the classifier.
